long_description: This replacement REI Mars hipbelt fits 2010 REI Mars 80 backpacks and incorporates forward-pull ergonomics for easy adjustment. Precurved hipbelt is designed to cradle hip bones for a natural fit and to distribute weight without sagging. Hipbelt webbing system allows you to use a natural forward pulling motion for quick, easy cinching and precise adjustment. Hipbelt pocket stores those small essentials you want at your finger tips, such as lip balm and sunscreen. Lash points on the other side of hipbelt let you attach camera and GPS pouches. Note: this hipbelt is only compatible with the 2010 Mars 80 backpack (item #795513).
short_description: This replacement REI Mars hipbelt fits 2010 REI Mars 80 backpacks and incorporates forward-pull ergonomics for easy adjustment.
